pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption:
This video features a scenic, slow-moving aerial shot of a city. The camera gradually ascends, revealing more of the urban landscape.

The shot captures a sprawling cityscape set against a backdrop of large mountains under a partly cloudy blue sky. In the foreground, lush green treetops and the roofs of residential buildings are visible. The mid-ground and background are filled with a dense collection of high-rise buildings and skyscrapers that make up the city's downtown core.
